title: Client won't update
body:
http://imgur.com/pGsGhHh

Why won't it move past zero?

replies.body: This can happen if your connection is having issues reaching the patching server, so it can't get any updates.  Try out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to remove any blocks or issues getting in the way, and grab those updates!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7upXswBi,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-04-27T22:03:54.624+0000)
>
> This can happen if your connection is having issues reaching the patching server, so it can't get any updates.  Try out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to remove any blocks or issues getting in the way, and grab those updates!

OMG, A Riot member actually commented to me ^.^. I feel special. Also, I don't know what it is, but something about you Riot people make my client start patching. It wasn't until 9 minutes ago that the patch finally started working. Riot magic :D
What do i do when hextech repair tool doesnt work?
Depends!  The tool has different uses depending on the issue.  What's going on?

> [{quoted}](name=DrunkEngland,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7upXswBi,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-04-28T01:37:46.687+0000)
>
> What do i do when hextech repair tool doesnt work?

I wouldn't know then. Try asking Riot Support. They seem to know a lot. Helped with multiple issues.
This is happening to me still...
My client is sticking and failing on the tristana_base_sfx_audio file scan/check.  The update has failed numerous times at this same spot.

> [{quoted}](name=Uni TriTri Hepta,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7upXswBi,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-04-27T22:45:53.053+0000)
>
> This is happening to me still...

For me, I used the Hextech Repair Tool. Set it to Force Patch and Re-install, should work.
So it isn't just me. Damn.

> [{quoted}](name=LeWads,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7upXswBi,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-27T21:51:37.010+0000)
>
> So it isn't just me. Damn.

For me, I used the Hextech Repair Tool. Set it to Force Patch and Re-install, should work. That is if you are still having problems.
